Translations.Text: Owange ggwe Nabbi gamba bakyalabo ne bawalabo ne bakyala ba bakkiriza babe nga beebikkirira obukaaya bwabwe, ekyo kye kyanguya okuba nga bamanyika (nti ba kitiibwa) olwo nno baleme kunyiizibwa. Bulijjo Katonda muyitirivu wa kusonyiwa era muyitirivu wa kusaasira

Abannanfusi n'abo abalina obulwadde mu mitima gyabwe n'abasaasaanya kalebule mu Madinah bwe banaaba tebeekomyeko tujja kukusobozesa okubakolako, n'ekinaddako tebagenda kuddayo kubeera naawe mu kyo okugyako ekiseera kitono
Bakolimirwa, wonna webasangibwa bakwatibwa nebattibwa olutta
(Tebasaasirwa) ekyo ye nkola ya Katonda ku abo abaaliwo olubereberye, ate toyinza kusanga kukyuka mu nkola ya Katonda
Abantu bakubuuza ku lunaku lw'enkomerero bagambe nti: mazima okumanyibwa kwalwo kuli eri Katonda, ye omanya otya oba olunaku lw'enkomerero luli kumpi
Mazima Katonda yakolimira abakaafiiri era naabategekera omuliro Sai-ir
Baakutuula mu gwo bugenderevu, tebagenda kufuna wa mukwano oba omutaasa
Ku lunaku ebyenyi byabwe lwe birikyusibwakyusibwa mu muliro nga bagamba nti zitusanze singa twagondera Katonda era netugondera omubaka
Era ne bagamba nti: ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe mazima ffe twagondera abakulembeze baffe n'abatutumufu mu ffe, olwo nno nebatubuza ekkubo
Ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe bawe ebibonerezo byabwe nga bibaziddwamu emirundi ebiri era obakolimire olukolimira olunene
